instruction-for-use.navodila-za-uporabo: Pred uporabo pretresite. Z mehko krpo nanesite loščilo po površini in obrišite. Poliranje ni potrebno.

product-info.opis: Čisti in neguje polirane in lakirane lesene površine in ultrapas.

ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Paraffinum liquidum, Pin-2(3)-ene, Oleic acid, Alcohols, C12-18, etoxylated, PEG-40 castor oil, Dimethicone, Dišave, 2-Amino-2-methylpropanol, Propylene glycol, Limonene, Coumarine, 5-Bromo-5-nitro-1,3-dioxane.
